name: CreateServiceExtension
description:
Create a new extension for a service in PagerDuty.

This tool is used to create a new extension in PagerDuty, representing an Extension Schema object attached to a service. It should be called when you need to add or register a new extension to enhance a service's functionality. Requires scoped OAuth: `extensions.write`.

parameters.name: accept_version_header
parameters.description: Specify the API version to use by setting the 'Accept' header as a versioning header.

value_schema.description: The `Accept` header is used as a versioning header.

parameters.name: set_content_type_header
parameters.description: Specify the content type for the request. Use 'application/json' for JSON formatted data.

parameters.name: extension_details
parameters.description: JSON object representing the extension to be created, including necessary details for the extension schema.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Pagerduty API.

parameters.name: Accept
parameters.description: The `Accept` header is used as a versioning header.

value_schema.description: The `Accept` header is used as a versioning header.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
